catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 80
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: two cut-away interior vignettes with hill and trees between them; scene on left with man in black at left; standing lady at center in white flowered kimono and red apron-like skirt; three seated woman at right, one at left; woman in pink walking up stairs toward standing woman; two women in LRC in garden with white and red flowers; scene at right with man in white seated at top center; five seated women; one standing woman at left carrying a tray with a white cloth; unsigned
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
title: The "Jeweled Chaplet" and "Typhoon" Chapters from the Tale of Genji
